class.name: ItemCategory
class.description: This resource is used to add the same properties to multiple [ItemDefinition] at the same time. This category is also used by [member Slot.categorized] to specify a slot that can only accept a certain type of category.

method.name: get_code
method.description: Code used to get fast category on [member InventoryDatabase.get_category].

members.member: Color to identify the category. Used for example in a UI to paint a categorized [Slot].
Category icon. Used for example for a background of a categorized [Slot].
Defines dynamic properties for items that contain this category. Added automatically when [member ItemDefinition.categories] is set.
Defines properties for items that contain this category. Added automatically when [member ItemDefinition.categories] is set.
